prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing love greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Express love an appreciation to wife - 20 yeqr anniversary"
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Anjana 
From: Bijay
Message: "You are who I am. "

Reference: "Cute cartoon. Woman should have blond hair. Image should look younger in their 35 year old. Woman beautiful.  Man has csp on. "

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "love" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a warm and luminous watercolor style, where soft, blended washes of color create a dreamlike background, evoking the beautiful memories of twenty years together. The figures of Anjana and Bijay are rendered with gentle, flowing lines and expressive details, capturing their loving connection with visible, delicate brushstrokes that feel personal and handmade. The color palette is rich with romantic golds, soft peaches, and deep crimsons, giving the entire scene a radiant, heartfelt glow.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a love card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a warm and luminous watercolor style, where soft, blended washes of color create a dreamlike background, evoking the beautiful memories of twenty years together. The figures of Anjana and Bijay are rendered with gentle, flowing lines and expressive details, capturing their loving connection with visible, delicate brushstrokes that feel personal and handmade. The color palette is rich with romantic golds, soft peaches, and deep crimsons, giving the entire scene a radiant, heartfelt glow.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "You are who I am. " positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a warm and luminous watercolor style, where soft, blended washes of color create a dreamlike background, evoking the beautiful memories of twenty years together. The figures of Anjana and Bijay are rendered with gentle, flowing lines and expressive details, capturing their loving connection with visible, delicate brushstrokes that feel personal and handmade. The color palette is rich with romantic golds, soft peaches, and deep crimsons, giving the entire scene a radiant, heartfelt glow.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a warm and luminous watercolor style, where soft, blended washes of color create a dreamlike background, evoking the beautiful memories of twenty years together. The figures of Anjana and Bijay are rendered with gentle, flowing lines and expressive details, capturing their loving connection with visible, delicate brushstrokes that feel personal and handmade. The color palette is rich with romantic golds, soft peaches, and deep crimsons, giving the entire scene a radiant, heartfelt glow.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 ratio, featuring a stylized flat 2D cartoon illustration. The background is a warm, light yellow. The scene depicts a humorous moment of two characters assembling furniture. A woman with blonde hair pulled back in a ponytail, wearing a pink top and a bindi, is laughing heartily and pointing at an instruction manual. She has a joyful, expressive face with eyes closed in laughter. A man, wearing an orange baseball cap backwards and headphones around his neck, is looking at the same instruction manual with a comically confused or frustrated expression. He has brown hair. They are both around 35 years old. The instruction manual shows a diagram with a large \"X\" mark. Scattered around them on the table are furniture parts, screws, and another instruction sheet with a simple diagram. The overall color palette is warm and muted, with dominant tones of yellow, brown, and orange, creating a lighthearted and friendly atmosphere. The art style is clean and graphic, with bold outlines and flat color fills, reminiscent of modern digital illustration. The text \"To my forever partner-in-crime, Anjana\" is written in a friendly, flowing, dark brown handwritten cursive script, positioned prominently in the upper half of the card, ensuring readability and aesthetic appeal. The composition is centered on the interaction between the two characters and the furniture assembly, conveying a sense of playful shared struggle.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 ratio, continuing the stylized flat 2D cartoon illustration style. The background is a solid, warm light yellow. The design is minimal and focuses on subtle visual cues from the front cover to provide a peaceful resolution. Visible are a few scattered wooden furniture components, perhaps a single screw or a small piece of wood, rendered with the same clean graphic style. These elements are arranged artfully towards the center and left of the card. The bottom-right corner, approximately a 1-inch square, is completely clear and undecorated, reserved for a QR code. The overall mood is serene and complementary to the front cover, hinting at the completion of their shared task or a moment of quiet reflection. The color palette remains consistent with the warm, muted tones of yellow and brown, maintaining visual continuity without being overly detailed. The design is subtle and unexpected, offering a gentle conclusion to the card's visual narrative.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card with a 9:16 ratio, presented in a stylized flat 2D cartoon illustration. The background is a soft gradient of warm yellow to a lighter, peachy hue, creating a dreamlike and affectionate atmosphere. This section visually continues the narrative of their shared life, focusing on joyful memories without explicit characters. The design incorporates playful, whimsical elements like abstract shapes reminiscent of confetti or scattered stars in soft, blended colors of gold, peach, and crimson. Interspersed are subtle motifs that evoke the idea of partnership and shared experiences, such as stylized interlocking puzzle pieces or overlapping circles in muted, harmonious tones. The overall impression is one of warmth, love, and a decade-long journey, rendered with a clean graphic style that maintains consistency with the front cover's aesthetic. There are no people or text on this page, allowing the visual storytelling to lead.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card with a 9:16 ratio, featuring a stylized flat 2D cartoon illustration with a warm, luminous watercolor effect. The background is a soft wash of blended golds and peaches, creating a radiant and heartfelt glow. The central focus is the message \"You are who I am.\" written in an elegant, readable handwritten cursive script, colored in a rich, deep crimson ink. The handwriting has a natural flow and slight variations in line weight, appearing personal and warm. This message is artfully framed by innovative decorative elements that go beyond typical patterns. These could include abstract, flowing brushstrokes in harmonious colors, or stylized representations of shared memories or abstract connections, rendered in the watercolor style with gentle, flowing lines and visible, delicate brushstrokes. The decorative elements complement the message without overpowering it, creating a sophisticated yet approachable visual anchor. The color palette is rich with romantic golds, soft peaches, and deep crimsons, ensuring visual continuity with the other sections and reinforcing the emotional tone. There are no characters or explicit scenes, focusing purely on the message and its artistic presentation."
}
```

generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a playful, illustrative style. The background is a soft, muted yellow. A whimsical pathway, depicted by dashed lines and occasional solid curves, connects various iconic elements. At the top, two stylized coffee mugs with smiling faces toast each other. To their right, a cheerful blue and white airplane is shown. Below the mugs and airplane, a simple, orange-roofed house with blue doors and windows is connected to the pathway. Further down, a pair of golden wedding rings are linked. The pathway then leads to a black video game controller with a smiling face, and finally culminates in a large, colorful mound of abstract, layered shapes resembling a mountain, labeled "THE EVEREST CHALLENGE" in bold, black sans-serif lettering within a cream-colored sign. The overall aesthetic is flat, 2D, and uses a limited, harmonious color palette of yellow, orange, blue, white, black, and various pastel tones for the mountain. The elements are clean, with bold black outlines, and a sense of visual storytelling through the connecting lines.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with the text "You are who I am." The text is presented in a flowing, elegant cursive handwriting style with a subtle pen-like quality, rendered in a dark, rich ink. The background is a soft, warm golden-yellow, creating a gentle and inviting atmosphere. Framing the text, and subtly integrated around it, are two large "20" numerals. These numerals are stylized to appear as if they are made from a flexible, orange measuring tape, complete with clear inch markings and numerical indicators along their curves. The left "20" has its tail dipping below the text, while the right "20" is positioned above and slightly to the right of the message, with a delicate sprig of small, dark brown hearts and leaves gracefully emerging from its upper curve. The overall aesthetic is flat 2D artwork with a clean, graphic style, prioritizing readability of the message and unique decorative elements that subtly reinforce the anniversary theme without being overtly floral or clichÃ©. The composition is balanced, allowing ample space for a handwritten message to be added.
